scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Jamise // Spines & Vines
scrape.text: I'm so glad I did not purchase The Dinner and borrowed it from the library. This book has been compared to Gone Girl and it definitely is NOT! The author took too long to get to the point, there were times the story went flat and lacked the suspense needed for a thriller. I didn't like any of the characters and overall did not enjoy this read.
